_v.en: When Allah’s help comes with victory,

_v.ar: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
_v.en: and you see the people entering Allah’s religion in throngs,

_v.ar: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
_v.en: celebrate the praise of your Lord, and plead to Him for forgiveness. Indeed, He is all-clement.
